snippet: Coach Pia Sundhage decided it was time to go home to her native Sweden. She will stay on for the next two games of the United States women’s soccer team’s victory tour.
abstract: United States women's soccer coach Pia Sundhage is stepping down after the team's Olympic victory tour; will return to her native Sweden to coach the national team.
lead_paragraph: Coach Pia Sundhage decided it was time to go home to her native Sweden. She will stay on for the next two games of the United States women’s soccer team’s victory tour.

headline.seo: Pia Sundhage Steps Down as Coach of the United States Women’s Soccer Team
headline.main: Singing Her Way Toward Exit, Sundhage Steps Down as U.S. Coach
headline.print_headline: Singing Her Way Toward Exit, Sundhage Steps Down as U.S. Coach
